老師很活潑，鼓勵同學發言的部分很棒，但希望語速能放慢一點，並用中文上課，可以更完整、迅速地吸收上課內容~

Best class I took this semester !
2 suggestions :
-start with the historical part to have knowledge on the conflicts (before use theory)
-during the seminar, maybe let students inside the group decide which questions they want to answer
